Sat, 30 Nov 2024 08:11:05 +0000 Four people have been taken to hospital after a reported jetboat crash on the Rakaia River in Mid Canterbury.

Auckland Hells Angels member Brandon Cole sentenced to 22 years for record 451kg meth import https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-hells-angels-member-brandon-cole-sentenced-to-22-years-for-record-451kg-meth-import/YO5B6RDN3VCP5EP7BCX3PAIHHQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-hells-angels-member-brandon-cole-sentenced-to-22-years-for-record-451kg-meth-import/YO5B6RDN3VCP5EP7BCX3PAIHHQ/ Craig KapitanPolice never found the 451kg of high-quality meth. They solved the case without it. Sat, 30 Nov 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Hells Angels member Brandon St John Cole has pleaded guilty to what is thought to have been one of the largest ever successful methamphetamine importations into New Zealand. Photo / Supplied
